name: Life is Strange: Arcadia Bay Collection
overview: Life Is Strange Remastered Collection is a collection of Life Is Strange and Life Is Strange: Before the Storm remastered. It was released for Nintendo Switch in September 2022 as Life Is Strange Arcadia Bay Collection. The collection was said to include all previously released content with remastered visuals, improved character animation using full facial motion capture, refined gameplay puzzles, and engine and lighting upgrades.
